thread.title: 13 ’90s Rap Music Videos That Will Give You Crazy Nostalgia

author: VH1
title: 13 ’90s Rap Music Videos That Will Give You Crazy Nostalgia
text:
13 ’90s Rap Music Videos That Will Give You Crazy Nostalgia This is everything we love about the '90s. by VH1 11h ago 
By Marcus Reeves 
Just as memorable as the hip hop music hits of the ‘90s were the music videos of many of those rap songs. One reason was because production of those brought to the lifestyle of the genre we all loved. Looking back, as the decade progressed, so did the quality of clips, but there was a simplistic beauty in the videos that celebrated the fashion, neighborhoods and people of the culture. Let’s take a look at some of the visuals that will give you instant nostalgia when you see them. 
Lil Ray playfully asks how Nikki snuck her way backstage of the Ride 95 FM concert.
